title: School Board Appeals Court Decision in Case Filed by Former Teacher Concerned Over Content in School Libraries
description: Carolyn Burjoski, a former Waterloo Region District School Board teacher, was ejected from a school board meeting in January 2022 after raising questions about the age-appropriateness of some books in elementary school libraries that deal with gender transition. She said she is filing a $1.7 million lawsuit against WRDSB on May 4, 2022. (Screenshot via The Epoch Times)

title: US Swaps Aircraft Carrier for Amphibious Ready Group in Red Sea

title: Canada Voices Support for Media Freedom in Hong Kong on 2nd Anniversary of Crackdown

(Anthony Kwan/Getty Images)
